data.name: Ark Mobius: Censored Edition - adult patch

Unlock mature content.
More stories.
Full voice.
More animations and CGs.
data.about_the_game:
Unlock mature content.
More stories.
Full voice.
More animations and CGs.
data.short_description: This is a game containing "beautiful girl + rhythm game + multi ending GALGAME". In 2320, a huge monster appeared on the earth.Only magic energy can do harm to the monster.However,there is no more magic energy left on earth. So,you need to gain the energy from magical girls and save your world.
data.supported_languages:
Japanese*, Simplified Chinese*, English, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work.

All characters in the game are over the age of 18.
